bill_title: prohibit the Department of Transportation from constructing areas for the placement of  motor vehicle scales in certain locations.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit the Department of Transportation from constructing areas for the placement of motor vehicle scales in certain locations. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Transportation may not construct along a state highway any turnout or other improvement for the placement of vehicle scales for the purposes of motor vehicle weight enforcement if the turnout or improvement would be located within one mile of any business establishment that sells special fuel as defined by chapter 10-47 unless any such affected business establishment requests the turnout or improvement to be located closer. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
